attributes.action: stop Kraft closing down the Cadbury factory in Bourneville in Birmingham.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Job losses and factory closures are a certainty, they will need to save money to pay back the £11.7billion loan they have borrowed to buy out Cadbury. Therefore we would like the Cadbury factory to stay in Bourneville to maintain Birmingham's heritage.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
